Package sbw.project.cli.action

Class ActionSet

java.lang.Object
sbw.project.cli.action.ActionSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_ClockListener
public class ActionSet extends Object implements I_ClockListener
Defines a wrapper around the four action processors for the commands.

    • update_

      public void update_()
      Informs the listener that a clock update has occurred. Updates the queue of commands scheduled for execution according to delta time.
      Specified by:
